1.12.2.1.3.1: -Fixed the grate block when held in hand not rendering properly.
1.12.2.1.3.3: -Fixed gen issues. Wrapped Biome.getName() in world.isRemote() conditional statement.
1.12.2.1.5.0:
-Uses GottschCore 1.6.0.
Added new method for determining where dungeon is generated and keeping it within loaded chunks. Prevents cascading worldgen lag error.
1.12.2.1.6.0:
Added configurable Dungeon and Level json files to control dungeon generation.
Started porting to DungeonsEngine library.
Added Smooth Sandstone dungeon blocks.
Included the Wall Sconces.
Fixed Wall Sconces bounding boxes.
1.12.2.1.6.1: Update DungeonConfigMangers registry to use biome ID instead of biome name since getBiomeName() is client side only.
1.12.2.1.7.0:
Added dungeon config version check.
Added Chest Config to the Level Config (classes and json files).
Added external custom Loot Tables (replaces ChestSheets).Added Sandstone dungeon blocks.
Added Sandstone Gavel block.
Added Quarter Facade block.
Added corner shapes for basic facade block.
Fixed boundary box on inner/outer corners for basic facade.
Prevent certain facade blocks from having torches placed on them.
